short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It places issue's #ID first in a tab title

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you open an issue page, this extension will reformat the title of the page so issue id will jump to the first place.
Like this: "#100 The rest of issue title...".
